comments:
Open Advanced Tracing in PDE preference page.
Select one of the true/false values in the page and
try to change its value by opening the cell editor and
typing "true" of "false".

A PropertySheetPage embedded in a PreferencePage!
The error I get (note you have to TYPE the new value and hit enter) is 
an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in 
org.eclipse.pde.internal.preferences.TracingPropertySource$BooleanLabelProvider.
getText(TracingPropertySource.java:35)

Moving to PDE

I added a check in PropertySheetEntry.dispose to prevent the problem closing 
the Preferences Dialog

PDE is returned -1 when 'true' is typed into the combo box entry even though 
the value is one of the choices. A more complete fix would be to mark the combo 
read-only and limit the choices to the list of values in the combo box.

I opened bug #8027 against the Platform UI.
Fixed in daily builds, will show up in the integration build > 20020214
